oai_dc:dc.dc:title: C.C. Giers Studio portrait of a child, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A studio photograph of an unidentified child in fine dress. The verso is illustrative with the studio name of Carl C. Giers, located at 43 & 45 Union Street in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Boatright Family Photograph Collection, donated by Linda Ross Lee. 1 carte-de-visite
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boatright family
Carl C. Giers Studio (Nashville, Tenn.)
